fields.Title: PowerPoint Presentation for The Curious Writer, 6/E
fields.Description/Abstract:
DESCRIPTION
The PowerPoint Presentation for The Curious Writer connects learning objectives for each chapter to extensive resources that instructors can use in traditional, hybrid, or online courses.

Each chapter’s presentation slides introduce and illustrate chapter learning goals and offer strategies and activities for engaging students in the learning goals through informal writing, discussion and review questions, and revision workshops. Selected figures and diagrams from the book are included to facilitate in-depth discussion; additional graphics in the slides offer more opportunities for explaining concepts and processes in the chapter. Notes accompanying the slides include teaching suggestions, classroom activities, group work, and additional writing assignments..
